channel.title: Sensemaking on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Sensemaking on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Note to future self: on planning ahead and making sense
item.description: This blog serves a couple of functions, not all of which are sensibly part of the same easy to define train of thought. It’s note to self, or note to future self, for the sorts of things that I want to publicly remember so that I can find them again. It’s notes about places I’d aspire to be and events I’d like to go to. And some of it is research in progress, in which I get interested enough in something to write down what I find out about it and then wait for searchers to come up with good questions that find it (and more) so I can learn more.
